projects.name: Sonically Chosen
projects.description: Audio blog & living map app for cross-country road trip with 3D terrain visualization
projects.notes: URGENT - Moving out of LA week of July 18th! Need backend integration (FastAPI + Firebase), audio recording with MediaRecorder, 3D SoundTerrain visualizer, Mapbox integration, and Cloud Functions for Whisper transcription. Currently has UI shell ready.

projects.name: Freya from Saturn
projects.description: AI companion with fine-tuned GPT-4.1 Mini and three-tier memory architecture
projects.notes: Backend fully implemented and tested with FastAPI + Firebase. Frontend integration verified. All memory systems working. Just need Phase 8 - deployment. Easy win!

projects.name: Constellation of Qualia
projects.description: 3D interactive starfield portfolio showcasing creative works through space-themed interface
projects.notes: Beautiful 3D frontend complete with React + Three.js. Need FastAPI backend with Firebase/Firestore for dynamic content, LLM integration for AI-powered features, and admin panel for content management.

projects.name: Gorlea Dot Ink
projects.description: Mindful journaling with AI-powered poetry generation using Claude 3.7 Sonnet
projects.notes: Solid journaling app with text/voice entries, AI poetry generation, daily prompts, and poem sharing. Could add more features but very functional as-is.

projects.name: Job Hunt Tracker
projects.description: Kanban board for job application tracking with AI-powered insights
projects.notes: Nice React frontend with drag-drop Kanban. Need FastAPI backend + Firestore, job board API integration (Indeed, LinkedIn), and LLM integration for job matching and insights.

projects.name: Social Sprint Planner
projects.description: Weekly in-person social goals tracking with AI-powered event suggestions
projects.notes: React frontend done. Need FastAPI backend with Firestore, integration with Eventbrite/Meetup APIs, and GPT-4 for personalized suggestions and conversation starters.

projects.name: Atlas Part II: Scars That No Longer Hurt
projects.description: Immersive web experience with p5.js animations exploring emotional void narrative
projects.notes: Next.js app with 5 unique p5.js animations for each chapter. Need to complete all generative art pieces and ensure 60fps performance on mobile.

projects.name: Gorlea Snaps
projects.description: AI story generator from uploaded photos with text-to-speech narration
projects.notes: Solid app with Claude 3.7 for story generation, Gemini TTS for narration, Firebase backend. Very functional - just occasional maintenance needed.

projects.name: Meds & Mood Tracker
projects.description: Medication tracking with mood monitoring and AI-generated insights
projects.notes: Great React frontend with mood tracking and med management. Need FastAPI backend + Firestore, GPT-4 integration for correlation analysis and recommendations.

projects.name: The Snapdragon Files
projects.description: Cyberpunk investigation hub in Qualia universe with AI case generation
projects.notes: Terminal-aesthetic investigation app with Firebase backend, Claude for case generation, ElevenLabs for character audio. Mostly complete, could use some polish.

projects.name: VÄ€KRUNE - Voice Time Capsule
projects.description: Voice messages to future self with vintage tape recorder aesthetic
projects.notes: Beautiful PWA with FastAPI backend, Firebase, OpenAI Whisper, AWS SES. Ready for production deployment. Another easy win!
